institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 15-2 (Preparation and selection of candidate list for International Skill Competition Deliberation Committee)
contents: Article 15-2 (Preparation and selection of a list of candidates for deliberation committee members for the International Skills Olympic Games) ① The list of deliberation members for selection of international leadership committee members for international competitions is prepared by the Korean Committee in multiples of at least three times, and the official representative determines the order of appointment. ② When preparing a list of candidates for deliberation committee members, those who can perform fair and transparent work are selected from among experts with extensive experience in skill competitions. ③ If any of the selected deliberation committee members are unable to attend, they will be selected in the order of lowest rank on the list of candidates. [This article was newly established on January 8, 2021]
